metadata.title: CVE-2020-10289 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use of unsafe yaml load. Allows instantiation of arbitrary objects. Theflaw itself is caused by an unsafe parsing of YAML values which happenswhenever an action message is processed to be sent, and allows for thecreation of Python objects. Through this flaw in the ROS core package ofactionlib, an attacker with local or remote access can make the ROS Master,execute arbitrary code in Python form. Consider yaml.safe_load() instead.Located first in actionlib/tools/library.py:132. See links for more info onthe bug.

criterions.comment: ros-actionlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
